typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Emp ID} as string,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Age in Company} as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Department as string,
		DepartmentName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepData
source1, DepData join(source1@Department == DepData@Department,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Outp_Join.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
